structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A ORGANIZATION OF GOVERNMENT IN CITIES

text.section: The city administrative officer shall carry out all additional duties lawfully delegated by appropriate order of the executive authority and shall have the same powers as the executive authority in carrying out such duties.

law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980.
